text: A mkhare is a type of administrative division in the country of Georgia. It is usually translated as "region". The regions are further divided into raionis (districts). There are 9 regions in Georgia. Region Capital Population Estimate (as of Jan. 1, 2019) Guria Ozurgeti 109,396 Imereti Kutaisi 497,396 Kakheti Telavi 312,453 Kvemo Kartli Rustavi 433,162 Mtskheta-Mtianeti Mtskheta 93,636 Racha-Lechkhumi and Kvemo Svaneti Ambrolauri 29,701 Samegrelo-Zemo Svaneti Zugdidi 316,195 Samtskhe-Javakheti Akhaltsikhe 154,139 Shida Kartli Gori 257,279 ==References==
title: Mkhare
